SEARCH
Module com.example.form
Package org.uwo.cs2212.model

Class UserData

java.lang.Object
org.uwo.cs2212.model.UserData
public class UserData extends Object
Represents user-specific data, such as user-created layers and favorite Points of Interest (POIs).

  • Method Details

    • getUserLayers

      public List<UserLayer> getUserLayers()

    • setUserLayers

      public void setUserLayers(List<UserLayer> userLayers)

    • addPoi

      public void addPoi(BaseMap baseMap, FloorMap floorMap, PointOfInterest poi)
      This method is used to add a Point of Interest (POI) to the corresponding UserLayer for the given BaseMap and FloorMap.
      Parameters:
      baseMap - the BaseMap containing the FloorMap
      floorMap - the FloorMap where the POI is located
      poi - the Point of Interest to be added

    • removePOI

      public void removePOI(BaseMap baseMap, FloorMap floorMap, PointOfInterest poiToRemove)
      This method is used to remove a Point of Interest (POI) from the corresponding UserLayer for the given BaseMap and FloorMap and POI.
      Parameters:
      baseMap - The BaseMap the POI is on
      floorMap - The FloorMap the POI is on
      poiToRemove - The POI to be removed

    • editPOI

      public void editPOI(BaseMap baseMap, FloorMap floorMap, PointOfInterest oldPOI, PointOfInterest updatedPOI)
      This method is used to edit a given POI in the corresponding UserLayer for the given BaseMap and FloorMap
      Parameters:
      baseMap - The BaseMap the POI is on
      floorMap - The FloorMap the POI is on
      oldPOI - The POI that is being updated
      updatedPOI - The updated POI (this is a new POI instead of editing the old one to allow searching for the old POI)

    • updateUserLayers

      public void updateUserLayers(UserLayer updatedUserLayer)
      This method is to update a UserLayer in the list with a new version.
      Parameters:
      updatedUserLayer - the updated UserLayer to replace the old one in the list

    • removeFavourite

      public void removeFavourite(PointOfInterest poi, BaseMap baseMap, FloorMap floorMap)
      Removes a favorite POI from the favoritePois list.
      Parameters:
      poi - The POI to remove from the favoritePois list
      baseMap - The BaseMap for the POI to be removed
      floorMap - The FloorMap for the POI to be removed

    • addFavourite

      public void addFavourite(PointOfInterest poi, BaseMap baseMap, Layer layer, FloorMap floorMap)
      Adds a favorite POI to the favoritePois list.
      Parameters:
      poi - The POI to add to the favoritePois list
      baseMap - The BaseMap for the POI to be added
      floorMap - The FloorMap for the POI to be added

      public static UserLayer findUserLayer(BaseMap baseMap, FloorMap floorMap, UserData userLayerList)
